name: Deadly Premonition 2: A Blessing in Disguise
overview: The true sequel to Deadly Premonition is coming to Nintendo Switch. In the year 2005, FBI agent York visits Le Carré, a small town in New Orleans where he encounters a mysterious serial murder case alongside his “friend” Zach. Produced by the original creator team. The story takes place in a small town in New Orleans which was created based on research and interviews.
